definition: Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
to lift/to raise/to raise one's head/high/high spirits/soaring/expensive

sentences.english: The Cotton Tree is a historic symbol of Freetown, the capital city of Sierra Leone.
sentences.chinese: 木棉是塞拉利昂市中心弗里敦歷史的標誌。

sentences.english: At that moment Blair had been expounding on his work in Sierra Leone.
sentences.chinese: 那時布萊爾正在闡述他在塞拉利昂的工作。

sentences.english: I came to Sierra Leone for two reasons.
sentences.chinese: 我到塞拉利昂來有兩個理由。

sentences.english: Just as its neighbor Sierra Leone, Liberia was known for its blood diamonds during the civil war.
sentences.chinese: 和他的鄰居塞拉利昂一樣，利比里亞也以血鑽著稱。

sentences.english: I came to this country knowing about the problem of pirate fishing.
sentences.chinese: 我來到塞拉利昂時，知道這裏有偷漁問題。

sentences.english: Peace Corps volunteers left Sierra Leone in nineteen ninety-four because of civil war.
sentences.chinese: 和平隊志願者1994年由於內戰離開了塞拉利昂。

sentences.english: Cameroon have also qualified after beating Sierra Leone.
sentences.chinese: 喀麥隆隊擊敗塞拉利昂隊之後也成功晉級。

sentences.english: Sierra Leone is a land of honest men and women.
sentences.chinese: 塞拉利昂是一個男男女女都誠實的國家。
